name: Cross Match Technologies
overview: Cross Match Technologies, Inc. manufactures multimodal biometric identity management systems to capture and process the physiological characteristics of individuals. Its products include fingerprint and palm scan devices, facial recognition and iris capture systems, document readers, multimodal biometric jump kits, live scan systems, single/dual finger scanners, child identification kits, identity management products, and enterprise match servers. Cross Match Technologiesâ€™ products are used to conduct criminal bookings; perform background checks for job applicants; verify identities at borders and other checkpoints; register citizens for driver’s license, national identification, and voter programs; prevent identity fraud in large-scale government and civilian programs; and control access to office buildings, government facilities, and other secure areas. The company serves national and local government, law enforcement, transportation, child safety and student security, hospitality and gaming, critical infrastructure, financial service, education, and healthcare industries. Cross Match Technologies, Inc. formerly known as Cross Check Corporation, was founded in 1996 and is based in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida with additional offices in Arlington, Virginia; Quebec, Canada; and Bochum, Germany.

milestones.description: Cross Match Technologies Acquired by Francisco Partners
milestones.source_description: Cross Match Technologies Acquired by Francisco Partners
